publicationStmt.publisher: by John Cawoode, printer to the Quenes Maiestye.,
publicationStmt.pubPlace: Imprynted at London in Povvles Churchyarde :

notesStmt.note: Dated on t.p. Remainder of imprint from colophon.
Reproduction of originals in: Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
The lawes of the markette -- The statutes of the streates of thys citie agaynst noisaunces -- Olde lawes and customes of thys citie.
